content:
der, and murder is always and absolutely impermissible, an abortion
may not be performed.**Or, (3) as one’s duty to refrain from directly killing
*The term “direct” in the arguments I refer to is a technical one. Roughly what is meant by “di-
rect killing” is either killing as an end by itself, or killing as a means to some end, for example,
the end of saving someone else’s life. See [the following] note for an example of its use.
**Cf. Encyclical Letter of Pope Pius XI on Christian Marriage, St
